context_bundle.summary: External Secrets Operator reads information from external APIs and automatically injects values as Kubernetes Secrets

onboarding.quick_start: helm repo add external-secrets https://charts.external-secrets.io && helm install external-secrets external-secrets/external-secrets --namespace external-secrets && kubectl apply -f secret-store.yaml
common_patterns: SecretStore: 'apiVersion: external-secrets.io/v1beta1 kind: SecretStore' with provider configuration
ExternalSecret: 'apiVersion: external-secrets.io/v1beta1 kind: ExternalSecret' with secretStoreRef and dataFrom
Vault provider: 'auth: kubernetes role: vault-reader mountPath: /v1/auth/kubernetes'
AWS Secrets Manager: 'service: SecretsManager region: us-east-1 auth: jwt role: arn:aws:iam::account:role/ExternalSecretsRole'
Target secret: 'target: name: my-secret creationPolicy: Owner'
known_errors: Secret not syncing: 'kubectl get externalsecret' and check STATUS and conditions for error details
Provider authentication: 'kubectl logs -n external-secrets external-secrets-controller' and verify credentials
Permission denied: 'aws sts get-caller-identity' and check IAM role policies for secret access
Vault connection: 'vault auth -method=kubernetes' and verify Kubernetes auth configuration
Rate limiting: 'kubectl get secretstore -o yaml' and check provider-specific rate limit settings
